snippet.title: Evasion Announcement Trailer | Releasing Fall 2018
snippet.description:
Developed by Archiact in Vancouver BC, Evasion is an intense VR Bullet Hell game designed to immerse players in high intensity co-op multiplayer combat. Gamers will experience the next generation in VR locomotion, designed from the ground up for an authentic FPS action game. Featuring multiple hero classes suitable for all play styles, gamers can join friends or go it alone in an extinction-level battle for survival.  

Coming to HTC Vive and Oculus Rift in Fall 2018.

Wishlist the game now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/68...

Learn more about Evasion:
http://www.evasionvrgame.com/
https://www.twitter.com/EvasionVR
https://www.facebook.com/EvasionVR
https://www.reddit.com/r/EvasionVR

Learn more about Archiact:
https://www.ArchiactVR.com
https://www.twitter.com/ArchiactVRgames
https://www.facebook.com/Archiact
https://www.instagram.com/Archiact

Press: Please send interview and press demo enquiries to evasionpress@archiactvr.com
